metadata.title: CVE-2016-7948 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: X.org libXrandr before 1.5.1 allows remote X servers to trigger out-of-bounds write operations by leveraging mishandling of reply data.

notes.note: mdeslaur> https://wiki.ubuntu.com/1204_HWE_EOL sbeattie> same commit as CVE-2016-7947

criterions.comment: libxrandr package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:1.5.1-1').
